The Principal Software Engineer will join our Software organization to lead and drive the development of new features of our next generation InFlight Entertainment and Connectivity (IFEC) product suite. The Principal Software Engineer will work with SW architects and SW developers using Agile methods like Scrum and will also work with Integration & Verification team to identify root causes of remaining issues.
